values:
YAY! Thank you for this fab-tacular livejournal~ It's beoooo.ti.ful my darlings.

I always feel a bit overwhelmed making 'firsts' - this will be the first smudge on this lovely, clean, engaging journal (I apologise in advance). 

First of all, WELCOME BACK to all those who are back from overseas and I MISS YOU to people who are not here yet. I never realised how much I depended on my friends until now. I mean, y'know, whatever~

Secondly, I feel as if the idea of 'journey' has never been more relevant than now. 'Two roads diverge in a yellow wood' (I'm just typing from memory here) (FINE, groan if you must ^__^) We are really at the first cross-road of many yet to come in our undoubtly long and illustrious lives. Sometimes the twists and turns in my own maze of a brain are sudden and completely unexpected but I hope it was the right choice. 

To all future economists, vets, doctors, lawyers, media monguls and very very successful friends, I hope your journeys will be anything BUT imaginary. 

Here's something for the pessimist in me: Success is a journey, not a destination. So stop running.

This is the Melodramatic Rambling of Ron-Ron (Look Mummy! I can alliterate!!)
Roger, over and out.
